SubString.CExoString: What sort of effect would you like?
Have the Creator Window open and ready. effects are delayed by 5 seconds and will appear where you clicked.
What would you like the new weather to be?
A good gate effect. (Appear/Disappear after using)
An evil gate effect. (Appear/Dissapear after using)
a Delayed Good Gate effect (Create a Creature after using)
A Delayed Evil Gate Effect (Create a Creature after using)
A Delayed Summoning Effect (Create a Creature after using)
Demon Voice 'Your pain shall be eternal'
Demon Voice 'I will rape your soul'
Doomsayer says 'We're doomed, I've seen it, seen our deaths in the air'
Dunk man sings about an Ogre
Rough Man says 'I need more Ale'
